website_summaries.verdict: The Amazon Fire HD 6 Kids Edition is best understood as a simple container for Amazon's FreeTime subscription kids' books and videos. One that's covered by a no-questions-asked two-year warranty.
pros: Huge amount of subscription kids' content included, especially from Nickelodeon
cons: Two-page book spreads are too small to be readable

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Performer, Great Value - but some drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: A great product at this price with a stunning, clear screen. A little disappointed there is no facility to expand data storage or use external data storage via USB input. Connecting to WiFi not easy - essential you use WPS button on router or you'll be forever getting "authentication problem" messages. Amazon help pages not that helpful I'm afraid but persevere and you should get there. Transferring data is really a "drop and drag" exercise but you'll need to install MX player for most video formats.
customer_reviews.author: CityGent

customer_reviews.title: No choice
customer_reviews.text: When I first had this product - I was more than happy with it, but over the months Amazon have added a lot of their own apps that I do not use and do not want, but I am unable to delete any of them - so now the memory is taken up with a load of stuff I don't want and I am continually getting messages about low storage - I would NOT buy another, add I want to be in charge of what is being downloaded on my fire, I want to have the choice of what to keep and what to get rid of. So for me a perfectly good tablet had been ruined
customer_reviews.author: Moira

customer_reviews.title: Great device.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, I use it to download films on our painfully slow broadband so that we can watch them without buffering (it will link to the TV HDMI using a cable). It also passes the 5.1 surround through which is nice. It also continues to be responsive, even after many updates which some other tablets I have owned could not cope with. Amazons app store is a bit restrictive though.
customer_reviews.author: I. Longworth

customer_reviews.title: just right!
customer_reviews.text: i was just after a basic tablet for web use , so ideal for me .bought it after a decent review in "which" mag. was looking at a" samsung" tablet at £300 +, but this fire HD does the basics what i want at £100 ! ....+VE points ....clear display / easy to read ...nice solid feel to it... compact size...price...good battery life....-VE points ......screen a bit reflective....small screen size , but just about o.k....only the magenta (PINK !) version available , would have liked black instead. dont know about the camera , as it is of no use to me.
customer_reviews.author: tontobaker

customer_reviews.title: kindle 6"
customer_reviews.text: Returned it as I bought same for £15 less at Sainsbury's. I am using it now. It is easy to hold and made in a robust style. I have a 7" earlier kindle HD Fire and in comparison the older is better. This model is not so precise for example...touch screen is lethargic. It does not always react on a single or more touches which is an irritant. Other features have changed in appearance and I am not finding the logical way around as easily as with the older version. Maybe that is a matter of time and use. It is still a useful tablet but I am sorry there is still no USB or SD card slot.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I've got the paperwhite, but can't listen to audio books on it, so bought this kindle because its cheaper then the paperwhite with audio on it. Also it is a lot smaller then my 10inch kindle and must lighter to carry about in my handbag etc. Downloading books etc is not in long eating up the gb space so 8gb storage is not enough. I have to download the book I want to listen or read when out, once finished I have to remove it and download a new one so I've got enough for other things, other then that very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in super fast time despite being ordered over Easter
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my daughters birthday. Arrived in super fast time despite being ordered over Easter. The size is perfect for a seven year old and added to my account and making use of amazons Freetime and parental controls makes this ideal! The camera is of good standard and my daughter loves being able to take photos and make videos as well as read, play games and watch films. Certainly seems robust enough to deal with a seven year olds occasional mishandling too! She was particularly impressed with the lovely magenta colour! For the price I would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria f

customer_reviews.title: The hd is pretty cool though the image is crisp
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the old kindle fire 7 inch previously and I bought this expecting not much difference. The hd is pretty cool though the image is crisp. Its got a good camera too. Well impressed.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend whose really pleased with it but I was desperately disappointed to find on arrival that it won't take an SD card so unfortunately storage space is extremely limited. My fault for not checking this before I bought it but it does the job and picture and sound quality is very good for the money but just bear in mind IT WON"T TAKE AN SD CARD!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: HelenL7777

customer_reviews.title: fine for anything you wish to do on the internet, download movies, listen to music and a lot more.
customer_reviews.text: when I bought this it was a steal at the price, I don't use other devices now for it has it all. I first thought Kindle's were for book lovers but they are actual computers except they don't have the office stuff but it is fine for anything you wish to do on the internet, download movies, listen to music and a lot more. if you are looking to use it with add ons like Endoscopes it doesn't support OTG on the go services and wont work as no power output is available. Only later versions HD10 and upwards will support what you need
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade on basic kindle.
customer_reviews.text: A present from my son, this kindle was a pleasant surprise. My original kindle with clicky keyboard and page turner is much loved and I was worried about page turning by tapping. It's now second nature. The device can be held comfortably in one hand and bedtime reading's a doodle. I like the choice of colour for book pages and reading fonts too. Massive bonus is the WiFi.Easily watched catch up tv programs; have a synced link to my emails; comfortably browse the internet and have downloaded useful free apps like Pinterest & Solitaire. Warnings about screen-freezing have been empty. Mine works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. C. A. Southern

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for me by my husband for Christmas. I can say I am a bit disappointed. Got the 8gb version and when looked at storage available half had already been taken up with what Amazon had preloaded onto it with no way of deleting those I don't need, e.g audiobooks, etc. Will keep it as bought as a present but wouldn't recommend. Unable to expand memory like cheaper version which is a hugh disappointment. Only downlaoded a couple of games, e.g candycrush and all the memory I have left is 2 gb. Having to be very selective about what I download. So glad I still have my original kindle to read e-books.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: A Brilliant Substantial Kindle
customer_reviews.text: I have two of this model, though the other was the 8 Gig version. I purchased this 16 Gig model at a reduced price, which was so good that it was to good to miss. This model is small enough to fit in most inside pockets or trousers side pockets. The general quality gives it a feel of similar products that cost hundreds of ££££'s more. Appreciate that it will become near impossible to source a Similar New Kindle HD6 but should you be able to source a second hand one ( say via GAME ) with a 12 month warranty I would grab one.
customer_reviews.author: rj765

customer_reviews.title: very good but very very low sound.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I bought it to listen to audio books especially, and to join kindle unlimited for the narrated books. the problem is the sound at 100% I have to have it about 5" from my ear!!! so I thought it was faulty and amazon sent me a new one next day!! but the same thing terribley low sound. buy the way the sound is fine if you use earphones, you cant even have it up at full volume!! so I decided to buy a portable speaker only 13.99 on amazon and it works fantastic I can listen to my audio books and am really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: martine mcd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tablet good value comes from a well known manufacture. A name youcan trust.  AAA+++
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service received the tablet before the delivery date which was nice. My daughter set it up for me downloaded several games. As being disabled I have to spend a lot of time in bed which was very boring but now I have this Tablet I seem to be on it most of the time and the time feels like it flies by I am not bored anymore and it keeps my brain working. I looked at several different Tablets and I am very pleased I chose this one I know it is a good make and can do a lot more than me just playing funny games on it. AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: I already have a Nexus 7 but this little thing is a great replacement for my kindle that just died
customer_reviews.text: Got this for just under £30 from the Amazon Outlet so an absolute bargain. I already have a Nexus 7 but this little thing is a great replacement for my kindle that just died. Fits easily in my jacket pocket and lasts quite a few daily commutes on the train between charges. Just looses one star as it doesn't have a memory card slot and being a bit chunky. The screen is great, even sharper than the Nexus so great for the odd occasions I do watch videos on it but the big surprise is that it easer to read books on this than it was on my kindle paperwhite which it has replaced.
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Smaller kindle fire hd6 but just as good as previous one if not better with camera you can actually take pictures with!!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally delighted with my 2nd kindle fire hd Was bitterly disappointed that my original kindle fire screen gave up after 2 & half years! Was a nightmare having been told replacement (not free!!) had to be posted to a uk address wouldn't send to.me in France? Got it sent to mums and she sent to me over here so was without it for about 12 days Smaller screen 6 inch but very hand bag friendly and "At Last" a camera I can actually take pictures with!! About time Amazon... All my apps books music photos etc all on new kindle so nothing lost as I had,feared! Very happy with new one
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: This was a good price and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: This was a good price and it looks great. Initially I was worried that the screen would be too small, but it is actually pretty big. It is basically an iphone/ipod and a kindle combined. It has a camera, internet and emails already installed on it and you can download any other apps or games that you want. I synched my books onto it in seconds and it was very easy. The only issue I have had with it is that the touch screen sensitivity does not seem to be very good and sometimes you have to really "click" something a few times before it responds. Maybe it would work well with a stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches18

customer_reviews.title: Great little tablet
customer_reviews.text: Am well pleased with the device, our second one as my wife got hers last week, love being able to use it as a tablet as well and is much easier to carry round than my iPad. Good clear screen and good resolution, only two complaints that stopped me awarding 5th star is that the BT app cannot be used to pick up Internet signals automatically and the battery life is woefully short. The battery will drop to 75% in a day when the unit is not even being used, and where my iPad will last me around 36 hours, the Kindle is doing well if it lasts 12 in use. Same problem with my wife's .
customer_reviews.author: David Rossifan 46

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly Good!
customer_reviews.text: I took a bit of a punt on this mostly down to the price. I already own a Nexus 7 and a Tesco Hudl and have been really impressed with both so wanted to try something a little bit different. First impressions were great, it's a very solidly put together piece of kit. The 6" size feels pretty nice in your hand and works really well for browsing, reading emails and books. Amazon's operating system is quite slick too, you get an advert here and there as they're clearly trying to sell more content to you but it's easily ignored. The touch screen is really responsive and it feels like a really well thought out and implemented interface.
customer_reviews.author: Dave E

customer_reviews.title: Fire hd 6
customer_reviews.text: Sound poor.This was bought as a present for me I have an I pad and I didn't really need it. At the moment find it a bit confusing.dont use it a lot sorry. If I'd had this first and not had a tablet probably have used it more. Would add apps really easy to download same with music
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Nice - worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to watch Amazon Prime shows on - and it's perfect for that. Ready to use straight from the box, it automatically links to my Amazon account, and while I can't access some shows (US tv from Amazon.com - it knows which country I'm in!) the picture quality is excellent, and even the sound without headphones or speakers is more than adequate. The manual ... well, there isn't really one, and while I did find what I needed after a while (just remember to swipe from the sides) it would have been useful to have a quick guide to features, rather than just the on/off switch. One thing - use a stylus as fingerprints are distracting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet for the money hands down
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet for the money hands down! Bought for our son as he is always using our iPad but this is a great replacement. Simple to use and parental controls are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: Oh, I love this. If I could get rid of the adverts that welcome me when I open up it would be perfect. Out of box operation was swift, set up by eleven year old. Happy to have sound back again - as was an unwelcome omission from my second Kindle, a Paperwhite. Really good, clean picture quality. A small personal frustration is the implicit notion that the purchaser always knows what each symbol means. I can get a little cheese off just pressing this and that and, therefore, learning from experience. Sometimes a quick guide would be helpful, as in this case. But, a small niggle as I love it regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Tribe

customer_reviews.title: Portable HD video.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet basically to download Amazon Prime films and TV shows and I purchased a cable from Amazon to connect the tablet via the TV HDMI input. I already have a smart TV in the lounge but this set up enables me to use non smart TV's for this purpose such as in my caravan. The tablet itself has very limited access to Google apps and no access to Play Store so I could not recommend simply as an Android tablet. However I knew this before I bought it and at the price ( purchased from Tesco not Amazon with £10 off ) it serves ideally the purpose I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smallcombe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Handy little tablet - we use it for when out and about to keep the wee man entertained with games and downloaded comics and books. Initial set up didn't quite work - it wouldn't register my account properly just kept giving an error message but I contacted amazon help online chat service and they sorted it out in less than 5 minutes. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: me again

customer_reviews.title: ... hassle but for reading books and audio book it’s fine. Not worth the money I expected more for ...
customer_reviews.text: As long as you remember that this product is mainly for kindle use and you can use it for Amazon games and Music and of Couse films what they don’t tell you is that trying to link it up to your google account is a pain having to do a number of downloads and you might as well forget about Google play this is not the devise for it also if you want Google chrome on it I had to go onto YouTube and go through step by step I gave up and brought a fire TV stick less hassle but for reading books and audio book it’s fine. Not worth the money I expected more for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Not as good good as a standard Android device.  Let us access Google Play!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a nice and small tablet computer for when travelling, previously had Android devices and I was led to believe this was running Android in the background BUT it's vastly different. Can't access google play, Amazon app store has a much more limited selection. After struggling to transfer various saved levels, accounts, apps etc I have given up on it. If it's your first ever tablet that it'll probably be okay but I cant live with the limitations it has.
customer_reviews.author: M Stev

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very compact tablet which suits my needs perfectly. I travel regularly with limited luggage space and I can do everything I want with the Fire 6. It is not as slim as other tablets but this is not a problem for me. It is nice to have a choice of colours for the back and I am very pleased with my blue one.The battery lasts reasonably well and I am impressed with the speed of charging. My only issue is the advertising on the home page and I have contacted Kindle Customer Services for advice on how to remove this.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product for lots of reasons- can check e ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product for lots of reasons- can check e mails etc - bit like having a tablet with me and saves carrying my laptop when away. One real shame though is the reflective nature of the screen when reading. I can see the reflection of any window or light because the screen is quite high gloss - this wasn't a problem with my old kindle so not really sure why this screen has been made different. Otherwise a really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shalli

customer_reviews.title: An Amazon product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife at Xmas. Very good quality and well built. Slightly upset that the unit seems to be a portal to Amazon and has adverts at every click or goes to Amazon at every search on its integral search bar. Careful with the kids as its glossy adds for games could come at a price. Battery life is less than your average smart phone but as I say cant fault the machines build quality, picture quality and speed. I have an independent Vega android unit and can go where I please to source apps and gadgets etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Fox

customer_reviews.title: Superb small budget tablet
customer_reviews.text: Superb small tablet. I bought this 8 months ago and I'm really pleased with it. I carry it with me every day. I read and listen to books, music, Skype, watch tv, write documents, email, play games on this device. I am also just looking at getting a compatible keyboard/carrycase to make it a complete all rounder. I like the fact it's so portable; about the size of a paperback book and I can do so much with it. A happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: FrenchieBlue1

customer_reviews.title: FireHD 6, wifi 8gb black
customer_reviews.text: Nice bit of kit, excellent little tablet for the price, very sharp screen that is fully adjustable for brightness etc. not too heavy to hold, not a huge amount of storage but it was purchased as a Ebook reader so not that critical for me. As a reader it is superb, Amazon account syncs seamlessly so that books being read can be returned to exactly where you left off, even if tablet has been off for a while, downloading books from the huge selection in the store is simple too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dodros

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: It's a good tablet don't get me wrong I like it! First off its a good pocket sized tablet which I find so useful. However this tablet does not come with an sd card slot and therefore you are quite limited. Second of all it does not have the nice look of all the other fires operating systems. The battery is quite short however in airplane mode it does extend it. But the good things are that it's quick great quality picture easy to walk around places with it and just a good little tablet for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality, Very responsive. Highly recommended,
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality, Very responsive. The kindle can be used in bright/direct sunlight which is fantastic. I was out in the garden just today sunbathing whilst reading. I pay for Kindle unlimited which is a great service. I would like to see more books added though. It's light, portable and convenient. It's HD display is perfect, The fact it uses dolby audio provides perfect sound quality. It easily provides around 8 hours of use. Silk web browser is very responsive. I highly recommend it! Do not hesitate in buying!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Summer

customer_reviews.title: But it was really easy to get used to (I use it for downloading ...
customer_reviews.text: Due to my weak wi fi it at home was a while before I could register my kindle which was a birthday present.But it was really easy to get used to (I use it for downloading books only) and I particularly enjoy reading it anywhere as it slips easily into a handbag and the backlight makes it very clear in a dimly lit room. I also appreciate the ease in which a selected book is sent straight to my kindle within minutes and the vast amount of books available for 99p.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great product its the first time I have used a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product its the first time I have used a tablet I have always used my phone to do everything when I am on the move and at home I have always used the laptop but I thought no I will try one and I love it easy to use I can do a lot more then I can do with my phone a I've just started reading again and this is perfect for it then reading from a mobile phone screen much more clear on the tablet and a better smoother flow as well. Great colours as well and feels well built a bit more heavier in my hand but that feels good to me don't mind that.
customer_reviews.author: AddyLee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our purpose.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted an extra pad for the bedroom, purely as a reference and this fits the bill perfectly. It's pretty fast and while I'm still getting used to the OS, for the money I cannot complain. The adverts don't bother me and most importantly don't bother my husband who has a pet hate for ads on anything digital so it was worth getting for the £10 reduction. It's just a shame all the accessories are so expensive, it sort of defeats the object of the attractive price point of the actual pad.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been thinking about one of these for a year or two and finally made up my mind. I can't believe how good it is for the money. It probably helps that I am a Amazon Prime member and buy loads of stuff too. However, the apps are great and it does everything that you would expect a tablet to do. I'm especially impressed being a Mac man how responsive the touch screen is! Just noticed the latest price. I paid about £70 with ads excluded but this is still a fantastic device!
customer_reviews.author: nixlyn

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the previous Kindles
customer_reviews.text: Lacks the flexibility of an "ordinary" kindle and is less intutitve to control. For, instance the dictionary function does not just work by holding finger on the word to be researched. If anyone can tell me how to start this function I will be thankful. On the plus side it does sync to my other kindle for the point reached in a given book [although the reverse does not happen. Why?] Since I won this in some sort of competition I suppose it is ok, but had I purchased it I would have been fairly disspointed.
customer_reviews.author: disgusted of dagenham

customer_reviews.title: Such a shame!
customer_reviews.text: It could be the best tablet on the market however the lack of an SD card slot essentially means it's aimed at streamers and possibly readers. If you or you have kids that like to play games I would stay clear as the storage (16GB) will get used up really quickly. I'm at a loss as to why companies would even release an 8GB version these days.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: ... wouldn't install some of the new versions of apps like YouTube etc
customer_reviews.text: I've had a couple of tablets before but needed to change my current one as it wouldn't install some of the new versions of apps like YouTube etc. I have also got one of the original Kindle book readers which I really like. The Kindle Fire gives me everything in one device so I'm getting rid of my old tablet and iPod touch. The screen size is just about right for my needs and I can use the Fire at work for taking meeting notes using the build in Word processor plus a tablet pen. One my journey I can now watch films, listen to music, read a book or listen to Podcasts which make travel a pleasure
customer_reviews.author: MarkE

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I was hoping for !!
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at what good value this tablet is ! The photos and Video it takes are great when viewed on the 6" screen. Beyond 6" they are very grainy . Sound from the internal speaker is OK for watching films and videos. Great access to live TV. MP3 is good when I'm working. Lots of features. WiFi. Long Battery life. HD screen.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jeanette Fielding

customer_reviews.title: Fire HD6
customer_reviews.text: Light to hold and easier to access than my Laptop. I just pick it up, pop it in my bag and go..When I am sitting anywhere ie hospital waiting rooms, I can sit and read my books, play games or access my Facebook feed..its great. At the moment every thing seems to be going ok with the Fire, except one of the items I downloaded did not appear on my screen so I had to delete it, and I can not get google play to work (the white shopping bag icon is not there...Lj
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: It's a steel
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic budget tablet that functions as intended, unfortunately the app store does not have the you tube app but does offer an alternative that is ok. Build quality is good though a little cheap feeling, the speaker is good for its size, but it would have been nice to have stereo speakers. After installing the Fire OS 5 update the tablet slows down slightly but still works ok. Another even cheaper amazon tablet the Fire 7 might be a better option -- www.amazon.co.uk/Fire-Display-Wi-Fi-GB-Special/dp/B00Y3TM6CO/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1456257598&sr=8-2&keywords=Kindle -- .
customer_reviews.author: shodgson

customer_reviews.title: little Fire HD " ebook reader" excellent
customer_reviews.text: As my first tablet ever owned, I found it easy to set up. My account details were already loaded' so went straight to books. They look very nice , easier to read at night ( back light ) web browsing is smooth and clean. Amazon prime for 30 days is very good. I've watched two films so far - nice screen, some glare. I would think about getting a bigger one, but the App store is a little light for Apps, looks like around 50+ game's. I bought it for books- so very pleased to have a little Fire. I have tried one audio book, different but good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.PaulZ

customer_reviews.title: Fire HD Impressive Technology.
customer_reviews.text: I received the Fire HD 6 as a christmas present. I have had an original Kindle (with keyboard) for many years and it is still in daily use. I like to read instructions before I start using a new piece of technology so I haven't used my Fire much yet. I am impressed, however, by the quality of the full colour screen as my original Kindle is monochrome. It was great to see the books in my library in HD colour. I look forward to getting to know my Fire HD as well as I know my original Kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Ayrshire Davie

customer_reviews.title: I have been delighted with it
customer_reviews.text: This was not a purchase, but was won at a local fete. I have been delighted with it. Being a regular laptop user it is not an item I would have bought for myself as it would have seemed superfluous, but now, havonf seens what I can do with it, and can take it with me so easily in my bag, it will be a very useful addition to my 'electronic life'. I will mainly use it to view Netflix and to read, but have also installed some useful apps for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Hedgie

customer_reviews.title: Good value HD tablet
customer_reviews.text: A great little tablet with a fine HD display. Easy to get going but I would have liked a manual because all is not intuitive. It takes more time to search on the internet for those things that are not obvious (to me at least) than it would have done with a printed manual enclosed. Ok, so I can download what I need but that does not invalidate my argument. Nevertheless, I am pleased with this purchase. A fine tablet at a very competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. N. D. C. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Children are aged 3 and 5 and the size is perfect, screen quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my children and added the kindle for kids subscription. Children are aged 3 and 5 and the size is perfect, screen quality is great. Ordered two very sturdy cases too, and the kindle for kids subscription is super, plenty of apps and choice. I was worried that it would be more limited than my ipad, but for the age of the children they don't seem to have noticed and are very entertained. I paid £70 on a lightning deal so great value for money. The reason I didn't choose the kindle fire for kids specifically was the memory, I bought the 16gb fire and so far it hasn't been any problem with storage.
customer_reviews.author: Linzi Atk

customer_reviews.title: Great, just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great, just what I expected. Better than just a kindle as it is a small tablet (with wi-fi use only). So handy, pop it in my handbag to take to the hairdressers or anywhere you choose. Good battery time with up to 8 hour constant use. It is heavier than I expected but no great problem really. Yes I am pleased with my purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M.

customer_reviews.title: My Top Purchase of the Year!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically to take into hospital as an alternative to my iPad as I will be spending a lot of time there next year and wanted something that was small enough to hold and watch films and keep connected to the outside world! I am extremely pleased with this product, the quality is fantastic, and despite my reservations at the size for watching films, app's and email, I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: DreamingHeaven

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for smartphone and laptop
customer_reviews.text: I felt conscious as a parent that I spent too much time looking at screens. I also have a toddler who has smashed three smartphones. I decided to finally give in and buy a kindle. It does everything I need, and means I actually spend less time procrastinating on Facebook etc. The word processor and excel style program have been great for work, and the screen is a good size for reading books on. I love having audible back and its put up well with my toddlers attempts to destroy it
customer_reviews.author: mamafrog

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old and after about a month the screen colour changed and after a while it just stopped working. Waste of time and money. I was so upset because my son really loved it but he got frustrated too with the screen that he dumped it. I stopped using it on 2016 just I'm still being charged £1.99. Any advise on how I can get It stopped as it won't allow me to cancel the subscription on my account?
customer_reviews.author: Reko

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't be without it
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it LOVE IT, this is everything I wanted it to be and more. I'm a tech phobe but I love reading and after having my first baby 4 months ago I treated myself to this. I've had it a full month it's lightweight, clear screen, easy to use in fact I would say a pleasure to use as a first time tablet owner. My one wish is that the battery would last a little longer saying that i charge it up over night and it lasts my useage all day.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Kindle fire HD 6
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with my kindle fire hd 6 I already own a 7" but found it a little big to carry around as I would like,sent for the HD 6 boy what a differance not all that much bigger than a mobile phone I love it, fits in my hand bag a treat got all my books on it,so Im never without a read. Plus I can get the internet when nessersary
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little tablet albeit not perfect but neither is ipads etc either
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes browser crashes and touch screen stops working but it's decent little tablet great quality screen the single speaker a bit quiet sometimes on certain apps I especially like the night mode which shades the blue light so you can get a better sleep and the price was great under thirty for 16gb model whilst was on offer
customer_reviews.author: S. MCDERMOTT

customer_reviews.title: A bit too small!
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice little piece of gadget but that's why I gave it three stars. It just a bit too small. I think it would be more user friendly if it was the screen display was larger. I bought this for my mum to use as a simple tablet not too heavy to read her books and magazines but the screen is too small for her and now I wish I had spent a little more money and opted for the larger screen. That said it is ok and small enough for you handbag and fast and colourful. the grandchildren love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Small + versatile tablet, handy for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a hd7, hope it's more reliable as previous tablets (2) didn't last 12 months each! Husband ordered this size by mistake instead of the hd7. Considerably smaller screen which isn't as good as the 7, but more compact for travel. The reading screen for books is very bright even on the lowest setting, which I don't think is a good thing before bed. Not sure why it's brighter than the 7? Only time will tell if it's more reliable, I hope so.
customer_reviews.author: snowman

customer_reviews.title: Bargain of  the Century.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product at a fantastic price. I'd actually got my heart set on the paperwhite 3G kindle, but was waiting to see if it dropped in price, when a friend advised me to get a tablet, then the Fire was on offer. The only downside, and it isn't a major one, is that the kindle is really comfortable to read in bright sunlight, but the Fire has a bit of a reflective issue, BUT the Fire can be read in dim light as it has its own light source, which is why I was after the paperwhite kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and great response time
customer_reviews.text: Sharp display, and great response time. My one criticism is that trying to find a way to connect to tv so I could watch films on a bigger screen has been impossible. I have had to return two leads which were meant to fit my Kindle, but didn't. A lovely girl ( Aileen) on your help line advised of another method of connection, but this involved spending £70 more than the cost of a lead. Otherwise, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Top notch!
customer_reviews.text: Put a lot of thought into getting this fire. Trawled through reviews and eventually chose this one as its a better all round ebook reader and tablet and I have to say I'm not disappointed! I read a review where the person said it was a pocket rocket and they weren't lying! It's quick, great picture quality for both books and videos/ movies, easy to use, brilliant. The fact you get unlimited cloud use makes up for the fact it's not got a sd card slot. Very pleased with my birthday gift. Would recommend it whole heartedly!
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: I do like it because of the nice coloured pages but don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the original Kindle since Amazon started selling them but I kept dropping it when I fell asleep reading so it now has thick black lines across it. I thought it was about time to buy another one but instead of buying just an ordinary Kindle I thought I'd try the Kindle Fire HD 6 which I am still getting use too. I do like it because of the nice coloured pages but don't really need to use it for internet purposes as I already have a Laptop, Tablet & Smartphone but the price of £79.00 was too good not to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Wisegirl

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to read books especially on holiday but I have found it very useful for all sorts of other things. My grandchildren love using it for books games and educational apps. I found it a bit difficult to work out how to use it to start with a wish there was some sort of basic instructions to go with it. I think I have now figured out how to do most things and I must say I am really thrilled with it. I also have an I Pad and compared to that the Fire HD is amazing value.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Searle

customer_reviews.title: great e reader. highly recommended for price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little e reader. And not bad as a secondary tablet. The colours and bright and clean....great for reading and looking at pictures. 2mp slight waste of time, but the amazon cloud working well. Simple to use and small enough to carry around. Fast as well. Has replaced the need to open up the lap top in a lot of instances, but slightly dissapointed in selection of apps....but then again that's what the phone is for. Overall very happy
customer_reviews.author: Seren 66

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant fire hd 6, 6''
customer_reviews.text: Yes this did meet with my expectations and more, it is brilliant. I love it, I did not know it has music on it. I look forward to using it. The apps it has is awsome for it's size if anyone is just thinking about buying one, go for it I did I have no regrets. also there is a choice of colours, it is not expensive either, it would make a lovely Christmas present for someone but I am keeping mine for myself. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle cusltomer  Pauline Goulding

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this kindle fire. It often had to be forced started by pressing it for forty then some more. It keeps popping off Wi-Fi, It is amazingly slow, even when opening a book to read it. I would most certainly wouldn't recommend this fire to anyone
customer_reviews.author: granny orkney

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money but keeps freezing up!
customer_reviews.text: The design is pretty basic and easy to use. The only thing I'm not impressed about is sometimes the tablet freezes up and you have to hold down the power button to re-set it which is once a day or so which is pretty irrating when your 3 year old is trying to watch something... maybe amazon could look into this? I brought it for my 3 year old so he'd leave my ipad alone. It's good for the money just a shame about the freezing up.
customer_reviews.author: Yas

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter for Christmas, she hasn't seen it yet, t I have set it up ready. I was very impressed with the overall quality of this tablet. We bought my daughter a cheap tablet last year, and have learnt to never do that again. We chose a Kindle Fire as my husband has had one for two years and been quite happy with it. We trust the Kindle Brand, and were really impressed with the features on this. The cameras are great, as is the colour choice and size. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: MyMessyMojo

customer_reviews.title: My first tablet!
customer_reviews.text: My first tablet. I am not very technical but found this very easy to use and get used to. I really bought it as a "trial" to see how I would get on with it. The only instruction that came with it was how to switch it on - but it didn't need any more as it is really intuitive. I am enjoying it very much. Lightweight, good camera. Am very pleased with this buy but am still exploring it!! Have downloaded a couple of apps already and am happy with them. Well worth it - excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: rollingstone

customer_reviews.title: Fire HD 6, very happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: I have the HDX 8.9 and am extremely happy with it but I needed something a little smaller as well and this little beauty fitted the bill perfectly. As with all the Kindles (this is my 4th & my wife has one also), they are a reliable platform with easy access and many features. I love the screen refresh speed, the colour and clarity. Being able to have my purchases and calendar on both is exactly how I wanted to be organised, so another very happy Kindle customer.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Handy Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Although quite small the screen is very clear and easy to see. The tablet does most of the things that more expensive tablets do. E.g. Email, games, shopping, searching the web, books, Twitter, Facebook, etc. it was very easy to get familiar with. I have only had it a few days so have not tried anything else. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha

customer_reviews.title: Just the thing!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of a dinosaur with technology - I use a laptop for internet access, my mobile is an old Nokia that I've had for over 20 years, I like to read actual books and I'm not much of a gamer. I can't help wondering now though how I ever managed without this kindle. It's great! Everything I want is right at my fingertips and I can read, play, watch and listen to stuff on the one device. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D. Currie

customer_reviews.title: Does size really matter
customer_reviews.text: I have previously had 2 kindle fires hd7. I decided to get an hd6 after my last kindle died in a bath related accident. On the plus side the hd6 fits my hand much better than the 7 and I got more memory for my money. On the minus side I find the touch screen less responsive and at times I have had to turn off and restart to get the touch screen working. BUT I would recommend it as an entry level tablet, or a tablet for those who don't want one to act like a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: snape62

customer_reviews.title: HD6
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking of getting a new large screen phone but was put off by the cost also happy with pay and go that I already have, this hd6 is perfect for my needs, bought the 16gb and paid extra for no adverts etc, not worried about poor camera performance as I use cameras for photography. If I'm somewhere with no wifi I just use my phone ( S3 ) as portable wifi hotspot very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Willett

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: very pleased so far. I bought it primarily to use as a reader which I could alter the print size on after cataract surgery and only bought the Kindle Fire as it was on offer but so pleased I did as I can check emails and find more about attractions on the go and when on holiday as most destinations have wi fi. Still finding the screen a bit of a challenge so plan to buy a stylus. Getting ebooks from Amazon is so easy (not tried other providers yet) and there are loads of free classics. Only gripe is as many have said have there is no mains charger included and I see widely varying reviews about them
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality and useful.
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a spare tablet, for games and limited online searches. Websites can a bit slow, but games and apps are fine. Screen quality and battery life are good. An excellent tablet for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tamashi

customer_reviews.title: A lot of power for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tablet, wasn't expecting much for £79 but very impressed. Great selection of Apps, has all the ones I used to have on my iPad and impressed by the battery life and speed of this device. A nice touch is being able to download prime instant video content for offline viewing (prime membership needed) so I can watch TV shows and films without an Internet connection. Really like the Citron colour too - makes it standard out over the normal boring black tablets- get one today and you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: Small Kindle Fire HD 6
customer_reviews.text: Its a small Kindle. Small 6 inch screen. Mine has 8GB of internal memory which is quickly eaten up. There is no slot to add extra memory via a Micro SD card. On off switch and volume control and micro USB socket for charging. Its small and compact and therefore idea for small hands or travel but the big downside is its memory. Once charged the charge lasts very well even running Kodi
customer_reviews.author: achilles

customer_reviews.title: I'm a tad olde worlde when it comes to Smart phones and the like but a friend has bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a tad olde worlde when it comes to Smart phones and the like but a friend has bought this as a belated Christmas gift for me! Wow! I no longer have to sit at my desk top compi to read my emails or browse other sites. I read a lot but never really thought about 'e' books. I'm now on my second downloaded 'e' book and love the ease of use. I am still a novice when it comes to tapping the right bit or retrieving bits that I've tapped away by mistake. I expect this will come with practice and experience. Perhaps this is the first rung of the ladder for a more techno savvy silver surfer.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Well, what can I say. This is a great value for money tablet. I have an iPad and the first Kindle that came out but wanted something a bit more up to date for reading. The ipad is a tad large for reading so looks at the newer Kindle options after reading loads of reviews I plumped for the Fire HD 6, and I can honestly say I am not disappointed. For the price you cannot go wrong. The graphics are spot on, loading is quick and for me is an ideal size for reading books. First rate.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Was not expecting much at this price range but 3 months on, it's a pleasure to use, with excellent battery life, good amount of onboard storage (16Gb version) and most of all very compact (fits in a normal trousers side pocket with ease). Occasionally responsiveness becomes a bit laggy but quickly recovers. Amazon content is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Glen Micallef

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE,GREAT TABLET😇
customer_reviews.text: Excellent,I love the design and how its such a simple tablet!some tablets are too complicated and have too much buttons but the fire hd 6 is very easy and simple to use!the colour choice is great,I chose citron and my friend has dark blue so I can recommend those two colours!overall I would say that this tablet has helped me a lot and is great,it's also amazing value!I recommend you all to buy this fire tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Simon B

customer_reviews.title: kindle help line needs addressing if they want to attract the older genertion
customer_reviews.text: Ok, but when I telephoned for help the gentleman was very difficult to understand ( and others have said the same) and had little patience and made me feel very stupid.. I would hesitate before telephoning for help again and my problems are still not resolved. My kindle could do so much more for me if the gentleman had had more patience and perhaps could have been kinder
customer_reviews.author: Mrs John Millard Barnes

customer_reviews.title: This is a far superior product to the original 8
customer_reviews.text: This is a far superior product to the original 8.7 Kindle Fire I purchased last year. Charges quicker and hold the charge longer. Great size for travelling or just keeping in your handbag. I did read some reviews which stated it is 'clunky' but I feel it is very substantial and unlikely to get broken. Easy to navigate - even for a 'technophobe' like me. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Perfect present
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device. I ordered this as a present for someone but was a little worried about the size but it is a perfect size to hold in your hand. You wouldnt be able to get much work done on it (i.e. in word or powerpoint) as i think it is too small for that but for reading, gaming, watching videos and surfing the net it is perfect. The battery lasts really well and the device is really portable. The price is really affordable too!!!
customer_reviews.author: A-J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet practical
customer_reviews.text: My wife point is for me for my birthday it was a very wonderful surprise and using it has been very beneficial . I love the practicality of being able to take my whole library with me wherever I go . I can also do work on the go. I would recommend this product to anybody who needs a device that is compact and yet can do a lot.
customer_reviews.author: BRT

customer_reviews.title: We are pleased with the purchase and no complaints so
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. I am able to use the password to lock it and leave only reading materials during the week and that was the deciding factor for me. She uses it daily and reads more than she used to. She has not experienced any adverts as some consumers have stated. We are pleased with the purchase and no complaints so far
customer_reviews.author: VICTOR

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Not much I can say that others haven't
customer_reviews.text: It's only just arrived, but is a lovely device. Fits perfectly in the hand and is configured to my account, ready for use. Nice. Not much I can say that others haven't. I was, however, tempted to give it 4 stars simply because of the power connection; why oh why would you put the USB power connector on the top? This completely negates the use of any kind of docking station. It's a small point, but is a really poor design choice.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Sussman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described - massive upgrade on 1st ever kindle which o previously owned. Battery life not brilliant - I understand that if it's merely books you're interested in - then the paperwhite battery is fabulous. To surf internet too this is good. Size of a small paperback so very portable. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy fire user
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have an iPad and a Kindle paper white. I find the Kinle fire easy to use and carry around as the iPad can be a little heavy and big if going out or on holidays. The kindle paper white will still be well used as it can be used outside and has a longer battery life but the fire has lots of advantages such as browsing the internet. Great buy but glad I bought the 16gb
customer_reviews.author: tiggypop

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a update from a review I did of the 32gb 10.1 inch latest 4.4.2.Kitkat tablet Rockchip all winner tech A31s Quadcore CPU Processor 1.5 ghz-. Internal Storage-Dual Camera 2x usb + HDMI+Bluetooth +3d+wifi+3g. As I previously wrote, that tablet was useless for the Hearthstone game. This tablet is fantastic. My son has reported that it has froze a couple of times but nothing to worry about.. All in all a great tablet.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Greaves

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, absolutely love it. Easy to use, easy to carry in handbag. Great for catching up on TV. A very clear screen with great picture quality and sound. I am using this for most things now. For the price a great great item and would recommend. I have been homebound with a broken leg for the last month and this Fire HD has been a life saver. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Chris from Darlington

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a fantastic product. Bought it as a "backup" tablet and ended up using it more than I thought I would! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TechGuy

customer_reviews.title: BRILLIANT!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Fire! Brilliant, easy to use and great value for £79.00. Some of friends' so impressed with it that they have purchased for themselves. What else can I say, the fact I can now read my kindle books in bed with a bedside light on is a huge bonus to me, so glad I did not go ahead with purchasing a new Kindle with a light. Would recommend over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Podtech

customer_reviews.title: Practical gift for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Got this a a Christmas present and I have found myself unable to put to down. I have found it great when away for a few days. Was able to check e-mails and read my books as well as play a few games, a bit heavier than my kindle that is just for reading, Battery life not so long when playing games as a laptop, but more practical to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Super value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tablets, so much fun, for so little money. I already have a 7" Fire HD which I use everyday and I love it. I purchased two of these 6" versions for family members this Christmas and they both love them. Both recipients said that these were the best presents that they had received in years. I won't go into what is so good about them as you can read the specifications etc., for yourselves in the product details.
customer_reviews.author: R B W

customer_reviews.title: As good as ever with some improvements
customer_reviews.text: The bevelled edges mean it slips out of grasp sometimes but the HD is a real bonus over my recently deceased Kindle Fire (the original). It is as easy to set up as the original and has easy access to all existing purchased items. Cameras are not important for me but they work well and deliver a crisp image. The sockets and switch are at the same end and this helps access. Charging lead is a little short if the mains socket is at floor level.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bridgeman

customer_reviews.title: Good for a book at bedtime
customer_reviews.text: I really like to read from my kindle at night in bed as its easy to hold and clear to read and takes less effort to flick over a page. I'm not normally a games person but enjoy solitaire and catch phrase for light relief from my husband's choice of boring TV from time to time. Sometimes I find I have to dab the screen several time to get the home icon up-that's the only niggle so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G.Bucke

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Its amazing, i enjoy reading and have gone through 2 books already with it- its easy to use and the screen has been great for watching video and looking at pictures. I can browse the internet, check email, and so much more compared to the original kindle. Ok so if you want a larger screen then go for a larger screen but this is more than enough for me and im very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: paul gregory

product_meta.title: Fire HD 6, 6" HD Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB (Black) - Includes Special Offers
feature_bullets: Fast quad-core processor up to 1.5 GHz - Up to 1.5 GHz for quicker apps and smoother videos
Beautiful 6" HD display - (252 ppi / 1280x800) with over a million pixels
Front and rear cameras - Rear-facing 1080p HD camera and front-facing camera for video calls
Free, unlimited cloud storage - For all Amazon content and photos taken with your Fire devices
Massive selection of digital content - Enjoy over 33 million songs, movies, TV shows, books, Android apps and games
Great for the whole family - Individual profiles for sharing books, games, apps, movies with family members. Plus Fire for Kids
Stay connected and productive - Fast web browsing, and e-mail support. Plus, edit and view Office documents
Prime members can stream thousands of Prime Video titles, and access over 700,000 titles and thousands of audiobooks
All-new, one of a kind app store experience where thousands of apps, games and in-app items are 100% free -- including extra lives, unlocked levels, unlimited add-on packs and more
